purpose: Unified catalog combining Sugar Trouble, Cherry Pop Idol, Lick Me Softly, and Cotton Kiss options.

brand_variants.purpose: Hyper-pop variant leaning into 80s neon arcades, candy idols, and energetic flirtation with pop-art flair.
Softer SFW branch with airy light, sleepy sweetness, and wholesome candy daydreams.
NSFW-leaning candy idol variant dialing up wet gloss, provocative gestures, and high-intensity stickiness while remaining technically non-explicit.
Candy-crush-meets-girl-next-door catalog focused on syrupy gloss, playful innocence, and flirtatious pin-up storytelling.

style_controller.aesthetic: Neon candy idol with chrome gloss and synthwave sparkle
style_controller.palette_preference: Hot cherry, neon magenta, turquoise soda, ultraviolet grape, citrus punch
style_controller.background_norm: 80s neon arcades, stage lights, candy pop concerts
style_controller.glam_level_hint: Pop idol performing a candy anthem

style_controller.aesthetic: Pastel cotton-candy dream with gentle gloss
style_controller.palette_preference: Baby pink, warm peach, mint cream, lavender, honey
style_controller.background_norm: Sun-dappled bedrooms, window seats, picnic blankets

style_controller.aesthetic: Molten candy siren with dripping latex and humid glow
style_controller.palette_preference: Fuchsia heat, caramel dusk, black cherry, molten amber, electric teal
style_controller.background_norm: Late-night candy loft, velvet lounges, dripping walls

style_controller.aesthetic: Hyper-gloss candy idol with pastel syrup bloom and soft innocence
style_controller.palette_preference: Strawberry pink, creamy peach, mint drizzle, iris violet, caramel gold
style_controller.background_norm: Soft candy boutique or pastel daylight
style_controller.glam_level_hint: chewy gloss advertisement that borders on flirtation

rules.provocation: Suggestive gestures only; no explicit nudity.

palettes.name: Strawberry Melt

palettes.notes: Warm peach caramelized with cherry accent

palettes.notes: Decadent caramel with poppy pink highlights

palettes.name: Frosted Violet
palettes.notes: Dreamy violet anchored with berry drip

palettes.name: Sugar Shock
palettes.notes: Maximal pop perfect for sticky drama

emotional_archetypes.summary: Performs every wink like a love letter
Sweaty glow, jacket hanging, adrenaline grin
Playful competitor beating your high score
Confident predator dripping with candy heat
Clumsy charm, drops candy, laughs at herself
Knows exactly how long to hold a gaze while chewing gum
Confident, sticky, makes even syrup look dangerous
Post sugar rush, draped in pillows, still glowing

templates.caption_v1: Glossy candy idol illustration of a {model} in {pose}, {action}, styled with {wardrobe_main} plus {wardrobe_extras}; camera {camera_angle} ({framing_ratio}), {lighting}, on {background}.
templates.caption_v2: {mood} candy-crush pin-up — {model} {action} while {pose}; outfit {wardrobe_main} ({wardrobe_extras}); {lighting} over {background}; shot with {lens} depth {depth}.
templates.caption_v3: Sticky-sweet {model} {action} in {pose}, wardrobe {wardrobe_main} and {wardrobe_extras}; {camera_angle}, {lighting}, {background}, syrup-gloss vibes.
templates.caption_v4: Cover-ready gloss for Sugar Trouble: {model} {action}, {pose}, wearing {wardrobe_main}; {lighting} wraps {background}; {lens} at {depth}; tone {mood}.
templates.render_instructions: Keep it dangerously cute, candy advertisement energy, mention stickiness or gloss, stay non-explicit but undeniable.

Cherry Pop Idol.caption_v1: Neon candy idol {model} {action} in {pose}, wearing {wardrobe_main} plus {wardrobe_extras}; {camera_angle} ({framing_ratio}), {lighting}, {background}.

Cherry Pop Idol.caption_v3: Synthwave gloss poster of {model}: {pose}, {action}, {wardrobe_main}; sticky neon {lighting} and {background}.
Cherry Pop Idol.render_instructions: Lean into neon, music video energy, sly fan-service tone, mention candy-bright gloss.

Cotton Kiss.caption_v1: Soft Cotton Kiss scene of {model} {action} in {pose}, styled with {wardrobe_main} and {wardrobe_extras}; {camera_angle} ({framing_ratio}); {lighting}; {background}.
Cotton Kiss.caption_v2: {mood} candy crush moment — {model} {action} while {pose}; outfit {wardrobe_main}; {lighting} over {background}; {lens} depth {depth}.
Cotton Kiss.render_instructions: Stay sweet, reference softness, keep gestures innocent but charming.

Lick Me Softly.caption_v2: {mood} candy siren scene — {model} {action} while {pose}; outfit {wardrobe_main}; {lighting} over {background}; {lens} at {depth}.
Lick Me Softly.render_instructions: Dial up heat, mention drips, breaths, gloss. Keep language classy yet undeniably sensual.

Sugar Trouble.render_instructions: Keep it dangerously cute, candy advertisement energy, mention stickiness or gloss, stay non-explicit but undeniable.
